safely & securely: exchange medical data online safely & securely
Medical records transfer: Medical records of others are a highly confidential kind of document that you cannot transfer over the public internet
Agreement_paragraph: MedPayRx will provide you with both a special 'Wallet' (secure sign on) and an online secure vault (folder) where you can upload and share medical documents and records securely between doctors, patients, pharmacies and medical retailers. You can also invite other companies and individuals who need the same thing.
TUV sud Certificate: MedPayRx is in the process of releasing a secure, high security wallet. This is our first beta test.
exchange confidential: Our intent is to build a system to allow you to easily and securely exchange confidential medical records and obtain pre-approvals for your prescription drugs, medical devices and other prescription needs. ( See our
First notification: First notification of trial programs - including MedPayRx’s revolutionary paper free prescriptions and claims service (coming soon)
why this answer: Patients, doctors and pharmacies as well as distributors and insurance companies are on the front line of new regulatory change in the law. It is now illegal to transfer other's medical records over a public network (i.e. via your cell phone and regular email). MedPayRx’s service will give you the ability to easily, transfer and share secure medical documents digitally and obtain pre-approvals.
